channel.title: Cosmic Horseshoe on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cosmic Horseshoe on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: This Might Be the Most Massive Black Hole Ever Discovered
item.description: New measurements of the galaxy at the heart of the “Cosmic Horseshoe” indicate that it could house the most massive object ever seen in the universe.
